summary: A former boxer gets involved with a club hostess trying to escape the clutches of her gangster employer.
cast: Yûjirô Ishihara|Mie Kitahara|Isamu Kosugi|Kenjirô Uemura|Hideaki Nitani|Ken Hatano|Kôjirô Kusanagi|Ayuko Fujishiro|Tomio Aoki|Nobuo Kawakami|Jun Miyazaki|Kenji Kawai|Shôki Fukae|Jôji Eihara|Hyôe Enoki|Akinori Hanamura|Gô Kuroda|Kenji Mizutani|Tôru Sumikawa|Shirô Yanase|Keisuke Tate|Naoki Sugiura|Keiko Hara|Yôko Takeuchi|Mikiko Sakai|Akiko Mifune|Chiyoko Shimizu|Masayuki Kawamura
title: Ore wa matteru ze
